pages.text: Any good engineer needs lights on to be able to see as they work through the night.
Powered Lanterns, when powered, keep the creatures of the night away. They allow power to be transferred through them, so you can link them together in a row.
$(bug)Floodlights are strong light sources. While they require more power than a simple Powered Lantern, they will create a cone of light up to 32 blocks long.

Use an $(hammer) on the top or bottom faces of the block to rotate the light or click its sides to change its pitch. By default, they require a redstone signal to run, however this behavior can be inverted with an Engineer's Screwdriver.
